meanings.sent2: Please write down Ned's name on the list.
meanings.sent3: Ned's name always makes me smile.
meanings.sent4: The name Ned stands out among the others.
meanings.sent5: I will never forget Ned's name.

meanings.sent1: I ned to pick up the pen from the floor.
meanings.sent2: Please ned down to tie your shoelaces.
meanings.sent3: He ned to reach the bottom shelf.
meanings.sent4: The tree ned its branches towards the ground.
meanings.sent5: Ned carefully to avoid hitting your head.

meanings.definition: A Scottish term for a hooligan or troublemaker.
meanings.sent1: The police caught the ned causing trouble in the park.
meanings.sent2: He was known as the neighborhood ned for his mischief.
meanings.sent3: The group of neds ran through the streets laughing.
meanings.sent4: The movie portrayed the antagonist as a cunning ned.
meanings.sent5: Beware of the neds in the dark alley.
